Name: DOOM DAY
About the game: A first-person shooter created in the classic tradition of dynamic and addictive combat. In the style of the legendary issues of the 90s. Inspired by bestsellers like Doom, Quake, Duke Nukem and Call of Duty. Feel like a real hero and show everyone who's the boss. You have to play as the only survivor after the crash of the pilot of a combat helicopter, fighting a huge army of enemies. Upgrade and supplement weapons with various modules and change battle tactics as you see fit. Improve your character's skills and don't let your enemies get bored. Go ahead or act stealthily. All in your hands. Peculiarities : The ability to modify weapons. The ability to improve the skills of your character. The ability to interact with the environment. Various options for killing enemies. The ability to act covertly. The ability to go ahead, sweeping away everything in its path. There is an opportunity to purchase ammunition and various modules for weapons in the in-game store. Multiple story endings. The game allows you to feel like a real hero fighting an army of mercenaries. According to the plot of the game, we play as a positive hero who, with incredible efforts, is trying to single-handedly neutralize an army of mercenaries and thereby save millions of innocent lives by preventing a nuclear strike.
Meta Title: DOOM DAY: Nov 25, 2021, GRIN IGOR and Full Overview
